'''''"If They Had Known the Unseen..."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Memories of Gurabad}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement references a verse from the [https://myislam.org/surah-al-araf/ayat-188/ Qur'an 7:188], "And if I knew the unseen, I could have acquired much wealth, and no harm would have touched me."
** "The unseen" is the Arabic term {{w|Al-Ghaib#In Islam|Al-Ghaib}}, which means "the future" in context of the quote.
